label: 領家方銭所下帳
本: Commerce and Finance in the Middle Ages: The Beginnings of 'Capitalism'. ACTA ASIATICA, 81 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 2001-09
見出し読み: りょうけかたぜにどころげちょう
説明文: The record of daily expenses at the shoen from the 4th of the seventh month of 1401 to the 3rd of the second month of the following year included in Kyōōgokokuji monjo.
